TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ConfigurationElement extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示組態檔內的組態項目。

span.span: Represents a configuration element within a configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是抽象類別，用來表示 XML 項目 （例如 Web.config) 組態檔中的。The is an abstract class that is used to represent an XML element in a configuration file (such as Web.config). 組態檔中的項目可以包含零個、 一個或多個子元素。An element in a configuration file can contain zero, one, or more child elements. 因為類別定義為抽象，您無法建立它的執行個體。Because the class is defined as abstract, you cannot create an instance of it. 您只可以從其衍生類別。You can only derive classes from it. .NET Framework 包含衍生自的類別以代表標準的 XML 組態項目，例如。The .NET Framework includes classes that derive from the class in order to represent standard XML configuration elements, such as . 您也可以擴充類別來存取自訂組態項目和區段。You can also extend the class to access custom configuration elements and sections. 包含本主題稍後的範例示範如何使用衍生自的自訂類別來存取自訂組態項目和區段。The example included later in this topic shows how to access custom configuration elements and sections by using custom classes that derive from . 您也可以如擴充標準組態類型， ， ，和。You can also extend the standard configuration types such as , , , and . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱這些類別的文件。For more information, see the documentation for those classes. 如需如何存取組態檔中的資訊的詳細資訊，請參閱類別和類別。For more information about how to access information in configuration files, see the class and the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作自訂自訂 > 一節中的個別項目，做為自訂 > 一節中的項目集合。The following code example shows how to implement a custom both as an individual element in a custom section and as a collection of elements in a custom section. 此範例包含下列檔案：The example consists of the following files: - App.config 檔案，其中包含名為自訂區段`MyUrls`。An app.config file that contains a custom section that is named `MyUrls`. 本章節包含簡單的項目 （它不包含任何其他項目） 和項目的集合。This section contains a simple element (it does not contain any other elements) and a collection of elements. 名為簡單的項目`simple`集合稱為`urls`。The simple element is named `simple` and the collection is named `urls`. - 主控台應用程式。A console application. 應用程式的 app.config 檔案內容讀取，並將資訊寫入至主控台。The application reads the contents of the app.config file and writes the information to the console. 它會使用衍生自的， ，和。It uses classes that derive from , , and . - 類別，名為`UrlsSection`衍生自類別。A class named `UrlsSection` that derives from the class. 這個類別用來存取`MyUrls`組態檔中的區段。This class is used to access the `MyUrls` section in the configuration file. - 類別，名為`UrlsCollection`衍生自類別。A class named `UrlsCollection` that derives from the class. 這個類別用來存取`urls`組態檔中的集合。This class is used to access the `urls` collection in the configuration file. - 類別，名為`UrlConfigElement`衍生自類別。A class named `UrlConfigElement` that derives from the class. 這個類別用來存取`simple`項目和成員`urls`組態檔中的集合。This class is used to access the `simple` element and the members of the `urls` collection in the configuration file. 若要執行範例時，執行下列步驟：To run the example, perform the following steps: 1. 建立主控台應用程式專案和命名的類別庫專案的方案`ConfigurationElement`。Create a solution that has a console application project and a class library project that is named `ConfigurationElement`. 2. 三個類別檔案放在類別庫專案中，並置於主控台程式庫專案中的其他檔案。Put the three class files in the class library project and put the other files in the console library project. 3. 在這兩個專案中將參考設定至`System.Configuration`。In both projects set a reference to `System.Configuration`. 4. 在主控台應用程式專案設定類別庫專案的專案參考。In the console application project set a project reference to the class library project. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#151](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/ConfigurationElement.cs#151)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#151](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/ConfigurationElement.vb#151)] [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#71](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/CustomSection.cs#71)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#71](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/CustomSection.vb#71)] [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#51](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/CustomElementCollection.cs#51)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#51](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/CustomElementCollection.vb#51)] [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#31](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/CustomElement.cs#31)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#31](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/CustomElement.vb#31)]

span.para: 每個物件會建立內部集合這些物件表示的項目屬性或子元素的集合。包含非自訂的資訊和功能所提供物件屬性。您可以使用程式設計或宣告式 （使用屬性） 的程式碼撰寫模型來建立自訂組態項目:-程式設計模型，每個項目屬性，您必須建立要取得或設定其值，並將它加入至內部屬性的屬性基礎包基底類別。如需如何使用這個模型的範例，請參閱類別。 -簡單的宣告式模型，也稱為屬性化的模型，可讓您使用屬性來定義元素屬性，然後以屬性加以裝飾。這些屬性會指示 ASP.NET 組態系統有關的屬性類型和其預設值。這項資訊，透過反映，取得與 ASP.NET 組態系統會為您建立的項目屬性的物件，並執行必要的初始化。在本主題稍後所示的範例示範如何使用此模型。

Every object creates an internal collection of objects that represents either the element attributes or a collection of child elements. Non-customizable information and functionality is contained by an object provided by the property. You can use either a programmatic or a declarative (attributed) coding model to create a custom configuration element: - The programmatic model requires that for each element attribute, you create a property to get or set its value and add it to the internal property bag of the underlying base class. For an example of how to use this model, see the class. - The simpler declarative model, also called the attributed model, allows you to define an element attribute by using a property and then decorate it with attributes. These attributes instruct the ASP.NET configuration system about the property types and their default values. With this information, obtained through reflection, the ASP.NET configuration system creates the element property objects for you and performs the required initialization. The example shown later in this topic shows how to use this model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件提供所需的內容做出物件會根據該評估的位置。A object provides the context necessary for a object to make decisions based upon where it is being evaluated. 物件提供的組態項目相關的環境詳細資料。The object provides environment details related to an element of the configuration. 例如，您可以使用屬性來判斷是否已設定在 Machine.config 中，或您可以判斷哪一個階層元素屬於使用屬性。For example, you can use the property to determine whether a was set in Machine.config, or you can determine which hierarchy a element belongs to by using the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會判斷是否這物件將會寫入至組態檔方法呼叫。The method determines whether this object will be written to the configuration file when the method is called. 如果傳回值為 `false`，則假設此組態檔表示目前的項目之狀態。If the return value is `false`, it is assumed that the configuration file represents the current state of the element. 根據預設，傳回`true`屬性設為透過索引子這之後物件。By default, returns `true` after a property is set through the indexer to this object. 覆寫方法以提供自訂的狀態表示項目。Override the method to provide custom indication of the state of this element. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何擴充。The following example shows how to extend . remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您一次鎖定所有的屬性，在您指定一個除外。The property allows you to lock all the attributes at once, with the exception of the one you specify. 若要這樣做，請您使用方法，如範例 > 一節所述。To do that, you use the method, as explained in the Example section. > [!NOTE] > 屬性可讓您避免子組態項目，要套用此規則不會受到修改的項目。The property allows you to prevent the child configuration elements of the element to which you apply the rule from being modified. 使用上父項目本身和其子項目鎖定，如果您想要將一般屬性。Use the property if you want to put a general lock on the parent element itself and its child elements. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用。The following example shows how to use the . [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/ConfigurationElement.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/ConfigurationElement.vb#9)]

span.para: 如果您使用和屬性同時適用於限制最嚴格的規則。
If you use the and properties at the same time, the most restrictive rule applies.
